def fun(a):
    m = max(a)
    idx = a.index(m)
    m = min(a)
    return [a.index(m) + 1, idx + 1]

    a = input().split()
    a = list(map(int, a))

def f(l):
    maxi = max(l)
    mini = min(l)
    l = [l.index(maxi) + 1, l.index(mini) + 1]
    l.sort()
    return l

    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    (i, j) = f(l)
    print(i, j)

case = int(input())
while case > 0:
    num = int(input())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    if num == 1:
        print(1, end=' ')
        print(1)
        case -= 1
        continue
    maxS = max(arr)
    minS = min(arr)
    a = arr.index(maxS)
    i = arr.index(minS)
    if a < i:
        print('%d %d' % (a + 1, i + 1))
    else:
        print('%d %d' % (i + 1, a + 1))
    case -= 1

import sys
input = sys.stdin.readline

def solve(n, arr):
    (mi, ma) = (float('inf'), -float('inf'))
    mii = mai = 0
    for i in range(n):
        if mi > arr[i]:
            mi = arr[i]
            mii = i
        if ma < arr[i]:
            ma = arr[i]
            mai = i
    print(mii + 1, mai + 1)
for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    solve(n, arr)
